page.description: Generate a collection of tables referenced by this table.
page.original:
SQL::Schema::TablesReferencedBy()SyntaxTIL as SQL::TableInfoList = TablesReferencedBy(Table as SQL::TableInfo)
Argument Description TIL SQL::TableInfoList contains a single Table property that is a collection of the tables referenced by the Table argument Table The Table for which the method supplies the referenced tables
DescriptionReturns a set of TableInfo items for tables referenced by the table passed in LimitationsExamplesSee AlsoSQL Schema Object, SQL Schema TablesReferencing Function
